name: Free Space Desktop Toy Desktop Game Amateurs Edition
name_original: Free Space Desktop Toy Desktop Game Amateurs Edition
description:
Free Space is a desktop toy/desktop game that takes inspiration from space invaders and kicks it up with the difficultly by slamming on the difficulty accelerator.

What is more that the game uses your desktop as the paying field. Perfectly harmless just a game... 

amateurs is $6
